languages.text: "Путь сквозь скопление звезд, что вы, мон-кай, зовете {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором{/g}, для Крудараха избрал совет провидцев. И Эклендиль был в их числе". {n}Дыхание Ирлиэт сбивается от прилива ярости, заставляя грудь вздыматься гораздо чаще.{/n} "Предзнаменования темного будущего сулили провидцам их же видения. Но от них отмахнулись, презрели... И моя душа до сих пор в смятении — почему".

traits.locale_text: "Путь сквозь скопление звезд, что вы, мон-кай, зовете {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором{/g}, для Крудараха избрал совет провидцев. И Эклендиль был в их числе". {n}Дыхание Ирлиэт сбивается от прилива ярости, заставляя грудь вздыматься гораздо чаще.{/n} "Предзнаменования темного будущего сулили провидцам их же видения. Но от них отмахнулись, презрели... И моя душа до сих пор в смятении — почему".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"
languages.original_text: "Путь сквозь скопление звезд, что вы, мон-кай, зовете {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором{/g}, для Крудараха избрал совет провидцев. И Эклендиль был в их числе". {n}Дыхание Ирлиэт сбивается от прилива ярости, заставляя грудь вздыматься гораздо чаще.{/n} "Предзнаменования темного будущего сулили провидцам их же видения. Но от них отмахнулись, презрели... И моя душа до сих пор в смятении — почему".

traits.locale_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Seer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's breath becomes ragged with fury, causing her chest to rise noticeably more often.{/n} "The Seers' portents promised a grim future. But they were cast aside, disregarded... And my very soul is still puzzled as to why."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Seer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's breath becomes ragged with fury, causing her chest to rise noticeably more often.{/n} "The Seers' portents promised a grim future. But they were cast aside, disregarded... And my very soul is still puzzled as to why."

traits.locale_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “对克鲁达拉赫而言，穿越{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}浩瀚星海的航线是由先知议会决定的，埃克伦迪也是他们其中的一员。”{n}伊莉耶特的胸口起伏得更加剧烈。由于愤怒，她的呼吸也变得粗重。{/n}“那些先知在预言中看到了可怕的未来，可那些预言遭到了鄙夷与忽视，无人在意……我的灵魂依然被这个问题折磨着——为什么会这样？”
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: “对克鲁达拉赫而言，穿越{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}浩瀚星海的航线是由先知议会决定的，埃克伦迪也是他们其中的一员。”{n}伊莉耶特的胸口起伏得更加剧烈。由于愤怒，她的呼吸也变得粗重。{/n}“那些先知在预言中看到了可怕的未来，可那些预言遭到了鄙夷与忽视，无人在意……我的灵魂依然被这个问题折磨着——为什么会这样？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the Koronus Expanse was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

languages.text: «El consejo de videntes, del que Eklendyl formaba parte, fue el responsable de trazar el trayecto de Crudarach por el mar de estrellas que los mon-keigh denomináis la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}». {n}La ira de Yrliet acelera su respiración.{/n} «Los portentos de los videntes prometían un futuro funesto, pero se desoyeron, se ignoraron con desdén... y a mi alma le atormenta una sola pregunta: ¿por qué?».
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: «El consejo de videntes, del que Eklendyl formaba parte, fue el responsable de trazar el trayecto de Crudarach por el mar de estrellas que los mon-keigh denomináis la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}». {n}La ira de Yrliet acelera su respiración.{/n} «Los portentos de los videntes prometían un futuro funesto, pero se desoyeron, se ignoraron con desdén... y a mi alma le atormenta una sola pregunta: ¿por qué?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「クルダラのために、お前たちモン＝ケイが{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}と呼ぶ星の海を通る航路は、エクレンディルをその一部として数えた先見司評議会によって描かれたものだ」{n}怒りからか息が荒くなり、ユリエットの胸が急激に上下する。{/n}「先見司たちの予知は、厳しい未来を約束していた。しかしその予知は一蹴され、軽蔑され無視された…そして、我の魂はいまだにその問いに…なぜという疑問に苦しめられているのだ」
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラのために、お前たちモン＝ケイが{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}と呼ぶ星の海を通る航路は、エクレンディルをその一部として数えた先見司評議会によって描かれたものだ」{n}怒りからか息が荒くなり、ユリエットの胸が急激に上下する。{/n}「先見司たちの予知は、厳しい未来を約束していた。しかしその予知は一蹴され、軽蔑され無視された…そして、我の魂はいまだにその問いに…なぜという疑問に苦しめられているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarachs Kurs durch die See der Sterne, die Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey als {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} bezeichnet, wurde vom Rat der Runenpropheten geplant, zu dem auch Eklendyl zählte." {n}Yrliet Brust hebt und senkt sich viel schneller, denn ihre Atemzüge sind voller Zorn.{/n} "Die Omen der Runenpropheten versprachen eine düstere Zukunft. Doch diese Omen wurden beiseite gewischt, voller Verachtung ignoriert ... Und meine Seele plagt noch immer die Frage — warum?"
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: "Crudarachs Kurs durch die See der Sterne, die Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey als {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} bezeichnet, wurde vom Rat der Runenpropheten geplant, zu dem auch Eklendyl zählte." {n}Yrliet Brust hebt und senkt sich viel schneller, denn ihre Atemzüge sind voller Zorn.{/n} "Die Omen der Runenpropheten versprachen eine düstere Zukunft. Doch diese Omen wurden beiseite gewischt, voller Verachtung ignoriert ... Und meine Seele plagt noch immer die Frage — warum?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Crudarach devait traverser la mer d'étoile que les mon-keigh appellent les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} en suivant un itinéraire tracé par le Conseil des Grands Prophètes dont Eklendyl faisait partie. » {n}La respiration d'Yrliet devient plus rapide et saccadée dans sa colère.{/n} « Les présages des Grands Prophètes annonçaient un avenir sombre, mais les autres leur ont fait la sourde oreille... Une question ne cesse de tourmenter mon âme : pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: « Crudarach devait traverser la mer d'étoile que les mon-keigh appellent les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} en suivant un itinéraire tracé par le Conseil des Grands Prophètes dont Eklendyl faisait partie. » {n}La respiration d'Yrliet devient plus rapide et saccadée dans sa colère.{/n} « Les présages des Grands Prophètes annonçaient un avenir sombre, mais les autres leur ont fait la sourde oreille... Une question ne cesse de tourmenter mon âme : pourquoi ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach için seçilen ve siz mon-keighlerin {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} dediğiniz yıldızlar denizinden geçen rota, aralarında Eklendyl'in de bulunduğu Ötesezen Konseyi tarafından haritaya dökülmüştü." {n}Aldığı her nefesten öfke yayılan Yrliet'in göğsü, daha hızlı kalkıp inmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler, kehanetlerinde amansız bir gelecek gördüler. Ancak bu kehanetler göz ardı edildi, büyük bir kibirle yok sayıldı. Ruhumsa hâlâ tek bir sorunun ızdırabıyla pençeleşiyor: Neden?"
languages.original_text: "For Crudarach, the course through the sea of stars you mon-keigh call the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} was charted by the Farseer Council that counted Eklendyl among their number." {n}Yrliet's chest rises and falls more rapidly as her breath becomes ragged with fury.{/n} "The Farseers' portents promised a grim future. But these portents were brushed off, disdainfully ignored... And my soul is still tormented by the question — why?"

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach'ın siz mon-keighlerin {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} dediğiniz yıldızlar denizi içinden geçen rotası, aralarında Eklendyl'in de bulunduğu Ötesezen Konseyi tarafından haritaya dökülmüştü." {n}Aldığı her nefesten öfke yayılan Yrliet'in göğsü daha hızlı kalkıp inmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Ötesezenler, kehanetlerinde amansız bir gelecek gördüler. Ancak bu kehanetler göz ardı edildi, büyük bir kibirle yok sayıldı. Ruhumsa hâlâ tek bir sorunun ızdırabıyla pençeleşiyor: Neden?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
